verses.roman:
ei-rūpe nityānanda 'ananta'-prakāśa
sei-bhāve--kahe muñi caitanyera dāsa

synonyms: ei-rūpe—in this way; nityānanda—Lord Nityānanda; ananta-prakāśa—unlimited manifestations; sei-bhāve—in that transcendental emotion; kahe—He says; muñi—I; caitanyera dāsa—the servant of Lord Caitanya.
translation: Thus Lord Nityānanda has unlimited incarnations. In transcendental emotion He calls Himself a servant of Lord Caitanya.
